pages.text: $(tool)Auto-Replant$() automatically replants crops after you harvest them!$(br2)Works specifically with $(important)hoes$(), making farming incredibly efficient.

pages.title: Compatible Crops
pages.text: Auto-Replant works with:$(li)Wheat$(li)Carrots$(li)Potatoes$(li)Beetroot$(li)Nether Wart$(li)Most modded crops$(br2)$(o)One click harvesting and planting!$()

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When you break a fully grown crop with a jeweled hoe:$(br2)1. The crop drops its items$(br)2. One seed is consumed from drops$(br)3. The farmland is instantly replanted$(br2)$(important)Saves so much time$() on large farms!
